item.description:
Come hear Peter speak at the Greenwich Tea Party meeting.
Let's back him up with alot of support.

Time
Monday Â· 7:00pm - 8:00pm
Location SBC Brewing Company
131 Summer Street
Stamford, CT

Created By :
Greenwich/Stamford Tea Party Patriots

It's official--Peter Schiff, running for US Senate will be joining us at our Monday evening meeting. Come find out why he is the only candidate in the US Senate race in CT and the country that has what it takes to end the tyranny of the reigning political class.

via Mo Thomas, barbara g.
item.name: Peter Schiff Speaking at Greenwich Tea Party Meeting
